bibl.title: Irenaeus and the Four-Gospel Canon.
bibl.note: Suggests that the Four-Gospel Canon and the Four-Gospel codex are inextricably linked, and that each presupposes the other. The Four-Gospel codex can be traced back to about the year 170.
bibl.seg: SKEAT T.C., Irenaeus and the Four-Gospel Canon.
Suggests that the Four-Gospel Canon and the Four-Gospel codex are inextricably linked, and that each presupposes the other. The Four-Gospel codex can be traced back to about the year 170.
